sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_ORDER ( ORDER_NO, SHOP_ID, ADDRESS, SHOP_NAME, PAY_FEE, STATUS, ORDER_DATE, BUYER_ID, SELLER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, MEMO, BUYER_LOGIN_ID, SELLER_LOGIN_ID, CREATOR, GMT_MODIFY, MODIFIER, GMT_CREATE ) VALUES ( #orderNo#, #shopId#, #address#, #shopName#, #payFee#, #status#, #orderDate#, #buyerId#, #sellerId#, #orderType#, #memo#, #buyerLoginId#, #sellerLoginId#, #creator#, sysdate(), #modifier#, sysdate() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TRADE_ORDER t SET t.STATUS = #status#, t.GMT_MODIFY = sysdate(), t.MODIFIER = #modifier# WHERE t.ORDER_NO = #orderNo#
UPDATE TRADE_ORDER t SET t.STATUS = #status#, t.ADDRESS = #address#, t.GMT_MODIFY = sysdate(), t.MODIFIER = #modifier# WHERE t.ORDER_NO = #orderNo#

UPDATE TRADE_ORDER t SET t.PAY_FEE = #payFee#, t.ADDRESS = #address#, t.STATUS = #status#, t.GMT_MODIFY = sysdate(), t.MODIFIER = #modifier#, t.logistics_fee =#logisticsFee# WHERE t.ORDER_NO = #orderNo#
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) as total FROM TRADE_ORDER t WHERE 1=1
and t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# or (t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS != 'ORDER_INIT')
and ( t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# or t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# ) and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_PAY'
and (t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_SELLER_CONFIRM' ) or (t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_BUYER_CONFIRM' )
and (t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS in ( 'WAIT_BUYER_CONFIRM' , 'ORDER_INIT' ) ) or (t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_SELLER_CONFIRM' )
and ( t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# or t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# ) and t.STATUS = 'ORDER_CLOSE'
and t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_PAY'

select t.* FROM TRADE_ORDER t WHERE 1=1
and t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# or (t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS != 'ORDER_INIT')
and ( t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# or t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# ) and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_PAY'
and (t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_SELLER_CONFIRM' ) or (t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_BUYER_CONFIRM' )
and (t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS in ( 'WAIT_BUYER_CONFIRM' , 'ORDER_INIT' ) ) or (t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_SELLER_CONFIRM' )
and ( t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# or t.SELLER_ID = #memberId# ) and t.STATUS = 'ORDER_CLOSE'
and t.BUYER_ID = #memberId# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_PAY'
ORDER BY t.GMT_CREATE desc LIMIT #dbStartNo#, #dbEndNo#

SELECT ORDER_NO, SHOP_ID, ADDRESS, SHOP_NAME, PAY_FEE, STATUS, ORDER_DATE, BUYER_ID, SELLER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, MEMO, BUYER_LOGIN_ID, SELLER_LOGIN_ID, CREATOR, GMT_MODIFY, MODIFIER, GMT_CREATE, logistics_fee FROM TRADE_ORDER t WHERE t.ORDER_NO = #value#
select count(*) FROM TRADE_ORDER t WHERE t.BUYER_ID = #value# and t.STATUS = 'WAIT_PAY'

select sum(t_d) from ( (select count(*) as t_d FROM TRADE_ORDER t WHERE t.BUYER_ID = #value# and t.STATUS in ( 'WAIT_BUYER_CONFIRM' , 'ORDER_INIT' ) ) UNION (select count(*) as t_d FROM TRADE_ORDER t1 WHERE t1.SELLER_ID = #value# and t1.STATUS = 'WAIT_SELLER_CONFIRM' ) ) B
